summary: Video “Voices of the Clone Wars” as posted by the account Commander Wolffe on youtube.  I don’t own it and I’m not profiting...
caption:
Video “Voices of the Clone Wars” as posted by the account Commander Wolffe on youtube. 

I don’t own it and I’m not profiting from it, I’m just sharing for everyone’s enjoyment, so go give the original video on YT a thumbs up if you like it like I did :D

Highlights for me were:

Obi-Wan’s voice actor offering an in-character commentary and talking about Anakin’s need for hair gel as an example.

Cad Bane’s voice actor going “No [implied: I wouldn’t be happy to find you in my space] but I’d be happy to have you for a price.” while talking to Obi-Wan’s actor XD

Anakin’s voice actor being all cute as hell

Dee Bradley Baker talking about the differences in how clones sound and making examples and notes on how some of them talk.

tags: you kind of remind me of leia a bit
summary: Hey ! Me again ! How about a Star Wars matchup ? I didn’t realize you did those til I re-read your fandom list and I’d love to...
question: Hey ! Me again ! How about a Star Wars matchup ? I didn’t realize you did those til I re-read your fandom list and I’d love to see who you’d match me up with !
answer:
Hi there! I’m so sorry this took so long.
Your Star Wars Matchup is…Han Solo!

You two would be a near perfect pair sense you both can be intimidating at first with your sassiness and his sarcasm. But once you get to know someone your a loyal comrade to the very end. He would love that your a girl who can have a soft spot for him but also can take care of yourself when push comes to shove. And having a lady saving you from danger can be just as swooning! Need space, you’ve got an entire galaxy to explore when you need you time, just make sure to check in with your captain once and a while. For a bad but undyingly loyal partner, look no further than the captain of the millennium falcon.

Here’s your matchup, I hope you like it!

tags: giving the bath folks what they want
han solo and his journey of the bath
summary: Han and Leia Appreciation Week - Day 5: Favorite Tropes/Clichés Three Baths by @lajulie24 (written as a gift for @losteeyore363)...
body:
Han and Leia Appreciation Week - Day 5: Favorite Tropes/Clichés

Three Baths by @lajulie24 (written as a gift for @losteeyore363)

Tropes include Real Men Wear Pink, Happily Married, Bath Bonding, and Almost Kiss. Not to mention Han Solo’s fanservice holomagazine cover and a hot tub on Hoth.

“I’ll go in if you do.”

Han was momentarily thrown. Had Leia just invited him into a hot tub with her? “What?”

“You heard me.”

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

tags: it's a good story but then my aunt went batshit and i lost inspiration
summary: so this seems like something the rest of the x-wing fandom might have opinions on. i could just chuck it in the discord but...
body:
so this seems like something the rest of the x-wing fandom might have opinions on. i could just chuck it in the discord but @corelliaxdreaming doesn’t go there much and may possibly have some specific input ^_^

so! “life, death, life”. which was gonna be my first five-things fic. i was gonna tie it together thematically with the notebook. what i’ve *got* is two notebook-less scenes (hoth and talons) plus plans for a thing that’s trying to turn into an entire wes/hobbie postwar novel and then some.

would it be like… weird to just… take off the five-things tags, mark “life, death, life” complete as it stands, and publish the other two scenes as separate oneshots? i don’t think i’m gonna be able to write the rest of it until i get my own place, if ever. and the three scenes i’ve got don’t really tie together except as general sort of… angst things.

(there is the potential to make the post-hoth one Much Much Fucking Worse based on a certain bit of research i did about hobbie’s timeline of injuries, but @irenkaferalkitty would have to help me do some Serious Medical Research and also I’d hit one of my own squicks pretty damn hard. also i kind of like the “well now i feel like an idiot” aspect the way it is now. but timeliiiiiiine.)

uh. so. like i know the Polite response tends to be like “do whatever you want” about fic shit, but like. anybody have Thoughts? post the other two as chapters and just make it a more general meditation on coping mechanisms instead of overextending the notebook thing? (i can probably write one more chapter and bring the notebook back in for symmetry.) post the other two as standalones? (pros: stop having a wip sitting there not updating. cons: two more titles and three more summaries. ;P)

it feels fucking stupid to do a “wes grieving” five-things and *skip fucking distna* but i don’t actually have any inspiration for distnaaaaa :-( well i had a smol bit of a thing but it might be stepping on @ewokshootsfirst ’s metaphorical toes a bit with reference to a certain other project of theirs.

(hers? one of the peculiarities with the way my brain does genderfluidity is that i’m seldom sure of anybody else’s pronouns either ;P)

anyway yeah. i’m sure not gonna get to write today, i have to be everywhere, but something to ponder

trail.content_raw:
so this seems like something the rest of the x-wing fandom might have opinions on. i could just chuck it in the discord but @corelliaxdreaming doesn’t go there much and may possibly have some specific input ^_^

so! “life, death, life”. which was gonna be my first five-things fic. i was gonna tie it together thematically with the notebook. what i’ve *got* is two notebook-less scenes (hoth and talons) plus plans for a thing that’s trying to turn into an entire wes/hobbie postwar novel and then some.

would it be like… weird to just… take off the five-things tags, mark “life, death, life” complete as it stands, and publish the other two scenes as separate oneshots? i don’t think i’m gonna be able to write the rest of it until i get my own place, if ever. and the three scenes i’ve got don’t really tie together except as general sort of… angst things.

(there is the potential to make the post-hoth one Much Much Fucking Worse based on a certain bit of research i did about hobbie’s timeline of injuries, but @irenkaferalkitty would have to help me do some Serious Medical Research and also I’d hit one of my own squicks pretty damn hard. also i kind of like the “well now i feel like an idiot” aspect the way it is now. but timeliiiiiiine.)

uh. so. like i know the Polite response tends to be like “do whatever you want” about fic shit, but like. anybody have Thoughts? post the other two as chapters and just make it a more general meditation on coping mechanisms instead of overextending the notebook thing? (i can probably write one more chapter and bring the notebook back in for symmetry.) post the other two as standalones? (pros: stop having a wip sitting there not updating. cons: two more titles and three more summaries. ;P)

it feels fucking stupid to do a “wes grieving” five-things and *skip fucking distna* but i don’t actually have any inspiration for distnaaaaa :-( well i had a smol bit of a thing but it might be stepping on @ewokshootsfirst ’s metaphorical toes a bit with reference to a certain other project of theirs.

(hers? one of the peculiarities with the way my brain does genderfluidity is that i’m seldom sure of anybody else’s pronouns either ;P)

anyway yeah. i’m sure not gonna get to write today, i have to be everywhere, but something to ponder
